html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-06292024-05-31LAB, ISC, NRCAN, TC, CIRNAC
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Labour Code (Sanitation)
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADA LABOUR CODE (SANITATION) in order to (1) allow all toilets to count towards the total count of toilets required by the regulations; (2) change or remove male pronouns and use gender-neutral language; (3) update parts of certain regulations to make references to standards ambulatory instead of static, wherever possible.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0118 Publication Date: 2024-06-19
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADA LABOUR CODE (SANITATION) in order to (1) allow all toilets to count towards the total count of toilets required by the regulations; (2) change or remove male pronouns and use gender-neutral language; (3) update parts of certain regulations to make references to standards ambulatory instead of static, wherever possible.
